title: Backtrace on Windows (phar) not being filtered properly
body:
I am getting the problem described at http://stackoverflow.com/a/8577944/99667 but with version PHPUnit 3.7.27, so I guess 3fd14394092288f2cc9891131fd1c2cb964ef4e5 hasn't fixed it.

The only difference I can see between my setup and the one described in the above SO question is the fact that I'm running from `phpunit.phar`.

I am getting stacktraces like:

```
phar://C:/work/xampp/php/phpunit.phar/phpunit/Framework/Constraint/IsEqual.php:170
phar://C:/work/xampp/php/phpunit.phar/phpunit/Framework/Assert.php:2134
phar://C:/work/xampp/php/phpunit.phar/phpunit/Framework/Assert.php:475
C:\work\public\dokuwiki_dev\lib\plugins\definitionlist\_test\syntax.test.php:203
phar://C:/work/xampp/php/phpunit.phar/phpunit/Framework/TestCase.php:983
phar://C:/work/xampp/php/phpunit.phar/phpunit/Framework/TestCase.php:838
phar://C:/work/xampp/php/phpunit.phar/phpunit/Framework/TestResult.php:648
phar://C:/work/xampp/php/phpunit.phar/phpunit/Framework/TestCase.php:783
phar://C:/work/xampp/php/phpunit.phar/phpunit/Framework/TestSuite.php:775
phar://C:/work/xampp/php/phpunit.phar/phpunit/Framework/TestSuite.php:745
phar://C:/work/xampp/php/phpunit.phar/phpunit/Framework/TestSuite.php:705
phar://C:/work/xampp/php/phpunit.phar/phpunit/Framework/TestSuite.php:705
phar://C:/work/xampp/php/phpunit.phar/phpunit/TextUI/TestRunner.php:349
phar://C:/work/xampp/php/phpunit.phar/phpunit/TextUI/Command.php:176
phar://C:/work/xampp/php/phpunit.phar/phpunit/TextUI/Command.php:129
```
